short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts default information of a lead into Clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Grabblify - The Ultimate Lead Grabber for Chrome! Say goodbye to manual data entry and hello to increased productivity. With a simple press of the "Q" key, Grabblify will extract all relevant information and effortlessly paste it into your clipboard in the following order: First Name, Last Name, empty cell, Job Title, two empty cells, Location, and Company Name.

Not only does Grabblify work with popular platforms such as LinkedIn, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, and Xing, but it also boasts a new feature that allows for multiple first names. Simply press "2" for two first names or "3" for three, and Grabblify will automatically populate the "First Name" field with the desired amount.

Our mission is to revolutionize the way you prospect, making it a seamless and enjoyable experience. With Grabblify, you'll increase your efficiency by 10 times and streamline your lead generation process. Get your hands on Grabblify today and experience the magic of effortless lead generation!
